text: I wish we did this for every web project. It would make our products better and us better front-end devs.

attachments.title: CSS Audits: Taking Stock of Your Code
attachments.text: A CSS audit helps to organize code and eliminate repetition for speedier sites. Susan Robertson shows us how to sleuth out potential trouble spots, along with offering tips on tools, documentation, and ways to keep our codebases lean well into the future.
attachments.fallback: CSS Audits: Taking Stock of Your Code
